39178037.review:
I love seeing games come all the way through demo phase and achieving their full potential, and Unforgiving definitely fits that category. I've been keenly following the progress of this one and just had to grab a copy as soon as it appeared here on Steam.

The plot is simple (and classic) enough, you and your bro get lost in some creepy woods, get seperated and then you have to fight to survive. Well, not so much fight, more like run. There's lots of running, sneaking around and hiding involved in this game as you are stalked by various monsters from Swedish legends.

The whole experience is downright terrifying, and there is very little respite from the chasing and pretty much no time to catch your breath as you hurtle from one spooky scene to the next before you're left, breathless and bewildered as the end credits hit.

Definitely worth your time if you like being chased around the woods by horrific things and exploring (there are hidden pages throughout the game for you to find, which tell you more about the things trying to kill you, which is nice). Whether it has replay value is another question altogether though, I'm not exactly itching to go diving in again, but maybe that's just because I'm a big wimp.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q8D-JgHWuyY

39071276.review:
Ein echt großartiges Spiel!

Es ist sowohl etwas für Freunde von Jumpscares dabei, als auch für Leute die düstere Atmosphäre mögen. Auch spannende Verfolgungsjagden sind vorhanden. Es gibt auch kaum Stellen, an denen ich wirklich lange gehangen bin... der Weg ist eigentlich  immer gut vorgegeben, sodass man sich nicht wirklich stark verzetteln kann.

Einziger Kritikpunkt ist die deutsche Übersetzung... ich habe deshalb in englischer Sprache gespielt. 

Da wird z.B. "Volume" im Optionsmenü zum "Volumen" oder es gibt 2 identische Einstellungen für Fullscreen und Vollbildschirm. Bei näherer Betrachtung stellt sich dann heraus, dass "Vollbildschirm" wohl ein Fenster ist, das den ganzen Bildschirm ausfüllt. Sprachausgabe gibt es nur in schwedisch.

Der Preis ist mMn fair aber nicht billig. Nach ~4 Stunden war ich mit dem Spiel durch.

38900197.review:
Let´s make this quick. 
Some reviews say to save your matches, that is the only light source in this game, if you don´t mind walking and like to search every corner you won´t have a problem, there is plenty of matches all around, you just need to look. 
Game is in Swedish language (i find it refreshing and it fits the mood).
Good atmosphere, sounds, dialogues and music are great, you need to play this with headphones and in dark.
Some puzzles.
Can be finished in about 4 to 6 hours.
Works well with Xboneone controller.
Runs on Unreal Engine 4, so you know what to expect. (it runs fine).
It is a refreshing small horror game with great mood.
Gameplay

Un bel titolo. Atmosfera audio/environment ben riuscita, peccato per l'IA poco efficace e per le traduzioni di basso livello che possono creare problemi per la comprensione della storia. Nonostante ciò lo reputo un bell'horror game da provare.

38550371.review:
Picked it up on release and finished it on 3,7h. 

Starts quite strong with a cool dialogue and twist in the beginning and then becomes a "horror sneaker" of sorts. Sound production is good and the atmosphere and surroundings are fitting to the game and setting (Sweden). Lots of "relate" for swedes i would say, especially in early dialogues.

It shows some northern mythical beasts and is at times actually scary. 

The mechanics with the matches is good and does a lot for the games feel as well as giving visuals. 
The enemies offer different kinds of problems however one of them feel allmost impossible to avoid which felt frustrating at times. 

I got clueless a few times but otherwise the game is pretty much straight forward.

I think this is a good and enjoyable game and considering this is the companys first game I think its well made. I hope there will be more to come in the future :)

38275589.review:
游戏已经通关了，可能是因为我是一个资深的恐怖游戏爱好者，所以说这个游戏我只用了不到3个小时就通关了。
先来说说优点：游戏的bgm恰到好处，游戏的解密也比较新颖，解密的关键要素是竖琴。游戏内文档和收集要素都是可以读的，简体中文翻译的也没什么毛病，北方的邪恶传说和民谣也一直回荡在玩家的耳边。
缺点：游戏的长度有点短》》》》对我而言相对较短！中期解密地图有点黑，可能会迷路对路痴不是很友好，游戏的结局很俗，很俗，依然是以梦魇无尽轮回的形式最为结局。
10分满，我给8.5分，也算是今年比较特色的恐怖了吧！！！
33块钱入得，还不错呦。

38263313.review:
Unforgiving- A Northern Hymn is a great change from the more standard horror tropes of the day such as asylums, hospitals, demons and serial killers. The setting and for most, unfamilliar folklore make this game feel quite unique. While the puzzles frequently involve "fetch quest" type tasks, the setting and story are such that this is not a bad thing- rather it helps add to a sense of helplessness as nothing can just go your way.

Pros
-Setting
-Folklore is interesting and unnerving
-Good mechanics
-game maintains a sense to keep moving forward
-Atmosphere is fantastic
-excellent sound design
-Good story

Cons
-On the short side
-Ending leaves something to be desired
-Your brother looks like he was assembled from a knock off do it yourself brother kit 

This game is no more a walking simulator than most popular and succesful horror titles. This is a great little game, albeit short, and I couldn't reccomend it enough to horror fans who want a fresh and interesting setting.

38242013.review:
[h1]Unforgiving - A Northern Hymn ist ein kleines aber feines Horror-Spektakel![/h1]
Unforgiving - A Northern Hymn ist ein Ego-Horror-Spiel, das stark von schwedischer Folklore & der nordischen Mythologie inspiriert ist.

[b][u]Lohnt sich das denn überhaupt?[/u][/b]
Ja! Denn in der Eigenschaft als Survival-Horror-Adventure bietet Unforgiving so ziemlich alles, was Horrorfans verlangen: Eine gute Story, mit geradezu dramatischen Momenten, eine ungewöhnlich dichte Atmosphäre, geschickt eingefädelte Jump-Scares und viele unterschiedliche, mythologische Bedrohungen. Für wenig Geld erhaltet ihr hier ein intensives,  hochwertiges, fesselndes Horror Adventure, das euch mit Sicherheit gut gefallen wird.

38228416.review: Amazing game! The atmosphere and mythology really tie this game together. The only problem I had was that I wish it was longer! I completed it in about 2.5 hours. So short but so good! If you don't have it you need to get it.

38116251.review:
The game, while clearly on a budget with some stilted animations especially on the human characters, was overall a great experience. I'm Swedish myself so I might be biased but to see our old religion and folklore come to life in a dark and twisted way was really awesome. The voiceacting was surprisingly good and the story was really interesting with lots of environmental storytelling. Make sure you explore while playing the game and your enjoyment will double. 

Although some of the awesome creatures you will encounter are a mixed bag. Some were really awesome and forced me to close the game to take a breath. While with some you could just run past without any problems. 

The game is roughly around 3 hours and while I think the pacing and the length of the game was really good it might not be enough for some people. Although the game made me want more and not less so that's really good. Lastly, the ending, while understandable, wasn't that great climax one had been expecting. I personally think that more endings depending on the choices you make would increase the replayability by a lot. 

Anyways, fantastic game with some short-comings, which depending on your preferences, can safely ignore. 

Tack så mycket för en underbar tid Angy Demon Studio!

38089987.review:
In seiner Eigenschaft als Survival-Horror-Adventure bietet Unforgiving – A Northern Hymn so ziemlich alles, was das (hoffentlich) starke Herz eines Horrorfans begehrt: eine gute Story mit geradezu dramatischen Momenten, eine ungewöhnlich dichte Atmosphäre, geschickt eingefädelte Scares und viele unterschiedliche, mythologische Bedrohungen. Zwar ist der Wiederspielwert des gut sechsstündigen Höllentrips nicht gerade hoch, da Unforgiving, wie so viele andere Adventures auch, weitgehend linear verläuft. Dafür bekommt ihr die Software aber schon zum Preis von drei Dosen Veggie-Ravioli – und das ist, unserer bescheidenen Meinung nach, geschenkt.

Detailliertes Review: https://survivethis.news/unforgiving-a-northern-hymn-review-horror

38088524.review:
Excellent atmosphere with nice scenery.  I thought the game mechanics were good - there weren't a lot of "puzzles" but there were plenty of opportunities to get lost, or worse, wander into the hands of something that wanted you dead.

There is, as many people say, a lot of walking.  I felt like this really added to the atmosphere.  I'm really happy to see Scandinavian folklore in a game - it's very different from Judeo-Christian mythology. The music haunted my dreams, and it was nice to be able to get a little bit lost a few times.

As very rarely happens, playing this game actually made me paranoid, and more than a little frightened.  Delightful!

38051154.review:
[h1][b][url=https://youtu.be/SjhyfGNVqo4]ВИДЕО ОБЗОР[/url][/b][/h1]

Unforgiving дебютный проект студии Angry Demon Studio вышедший в ноябре 2017. Хоррор игра, которая по задумке создавалась с подтекстом шведских сказок и мифов. Неплохой трейлер и отличное звуковое сопровождение лишь соблазняют вас купить сей фрукт и еще бы, ведь цена его не столь велика. Но что в себе таит новоиспеченный хоррор проект, минусы и плюсы а так же всевозможные нюансы. Предлагаю вам ознакомиться с этим небольшим обзором, а так же высказать ваше мнение внизу в комментариях.

Если вам понравился видео ролик, пожалуйста подпишитесь и поделитесь им со своими друзьями, поделитесь им в соц. сетях, я буду очень благодарен вам за это.

38022961.review: it's been a while since i've been really scared in a horror game. this game has a very uneasy atmosphere the whole time, it was only in the very beginning that i didn't feel uneasy or that there were no threats but that changes quickly. at first this may seem like a walking sim with some scary parts but don't worry that changes and the rest of the time you feel nothing but dread and uneasiness. i'm not sure if this game is worth the regular $15 price but with it being $10 now its a great buy.

38022351.review:
我的全流程解说攻略视频：https://www.bilibili.com/video/av16770564/
游戏流程大概2个小时左右，简单的点评一下游戏本身。
1.先来说说优点：
A.游戏的氛围塑造还是不错的，最后剧情的反转也很加分，基本具备恐怖游戏应该具备的各项元素，但是成绩中规中矩，不过国区价格也不贵，趁着打折，可以入手
2.再来说缺点：
A.游戏前期过于拖沓，玩家需要一直不停的在森林里行走大约15分钟，这一段时间我称之为垃圾时间，主要原因是因为这个流程没有营养，期间也没有高能，很大一部分观众可能熬不到15分钟就已经退出了。
B.其次要说的是，游戏的建模过于简单，主要体现在与场景，物品的重复，和人物动作的单薄。
C.在后者，虽然有汉化，但是是机翻，当然如果一定要说成缺点是不太合适的，毕竟就算是机翻，也并没有影响玩家对于剧情的解读，何况已经比一些连机翻都不给的游戏用心不少了。
——这里是个人对于游戏的评分，仅供参考
恐怖：6/10
画面：7/10
剧情：6/10
音乐：6.5/10
难度：7.5/10
流程：2.5H
喜欢我解说的同学，欢迎加群，496985652

38017883.review:
Materiał wideo: https://youtu.be/he7ItdOBcpY

Czuję się pozytywnie zaskoczony. Choć niewielkie produkcje niezależne grozy bywają zaskakujące i zawodzące zarazem, ta jest dość udaną odskocznią od większości kiepskich horrorów tego roku.

[h1]Mocne strony?[/h1]
+ Gra aktorska. Mimo, że oryginalnie postaci nie mówią w języku angielskim, idealnie oddaje to klimat produkcji i umiejscowienie akcji. Co więcej, po akcentowaniu, wyrazie emocji i sposobie wypowiedzi, doskonale słychać, że aktorzy dali z siebie wszystko i wyszło im to naprawdę dobrze.
+ Muzyka. Wprowadza do tej nordyckiej opowieści grozy mnóstwo klimatu. I słusznie, bo tego winno się spodziewać po dobrym horrorze, a a nie zawodzi, zwłaszcza, że...
+ ...muzyka jest elementem rozgrywki. Mamy bowiem garść zagadek (niestety, nie jest ich wiele), które obejmują na przykład granie na instrumencie. Daje to mnóstwo satysfakcji, zwłaszcza, że operujemy nim w pełni my.

[h1]Słabe strony?[/h1]
- Fabuła. Gra rzuca nas w środek "akcji", której sensu wprawdzie nie rozumiemy, a zanim się obejrzymy, musimy spierdzielać przed wachlarzem mitycznych stworów, z niewyjaśnionych przyczyn. Z lekka to niepoważne, zważywszy na fakt jak racjonalnie protagonistka podchodzi do sprawy.
- Gra jest potwornie krótka. Jak to bywa z niezależnymi horrorami ostatnimi czasy. 
- Potwory i rozgrywka są niebywale monotonne. Choć klimat daje radę, to w wyniku fabularnym nic nie jest wyjaśnione, a nam pozostaje dać dyla, kliknąć to i owo, odegrać serenadę i znowuż dać dyla w przeciwnym kierunku. Nieco więcej innowacji i urozmaicenia wyszłoby grze na dobre.
- Polska wersja językowa. Napisy są koszmarne. Mają masę błędów leksykalnych, stylistycznych i, o zgrozo, ortograficznych na poziomie tak elementarnym, że w trakcie gry można dostać grzybicy od samego patrzenia. Nie mam pojęcia co jest tego wynikiem, ale od samego czytania może naprawdę trafić szlag.

38012673.review: หลอนๆดี มีแปลไทย

38012131.review:
Just finished the game, very impressive what this small team of developers has accomplished! I don't play that much horror games, but this one with it's inspiration from Swedish folklore was something I from start to end really enjoyed!

Great visuals, animation and music/sound effects, you can tell that a lot of hard work and long nights went into making this game.

Already looking forward to your next project!

/ R

38011583.review: 游戏是不错，就是自己解谜能力差了点，难受

38002997.review:
首先自带中文好评一个。
游戏过程有点短，几个小时就能通关。
惊吓指数还行，适合我这种又怕恐怖游戏又想玩恐怖游戏的人。

37991880.review:
A game that's like a creepy bedtime story, telling you not to wander off into the woods because something is going to eat you. But not just eat you, it'll also eat your soul so when you die, you're just going to be digested. It's that sort of frightening thing that drags you from your mundane life and suddenly, your life isn't so mundane... Only it's because something has decided to curse you because you made a mistake.

Our protagonist isn't gonna win any awards for being a good person, but it's still upsetting to watch her suffer just so much. And sort of enticing. You can't help but play further because what's going to happen next? Turn the page. Keep this fairytale going. Let's scare the pants off ourselves and never go into the forest/marshes/etc ever again because even as we're adults(some of us) we're going to be scared for a while.

The game has an amazing way of setting the mood with sound and music. From the sounds of a forest that are simple yet you've always wondered "are we sure that's an owl cause that particular sound is weird" or cave sounds that also sound muffled and somewhat humanoid and strained, Unforgiving sets the tone of things to not be right so you're always checking over your shoulder...and sometimes seeing there really is something behind you.

While there's a management system with your matches, they're still pretty generous. Just don't be an idiot. Or in my case, don't get lost and don't realize this game is really dark even when the gamma is turned off. The achievement might suggest you're scared but no really, the game is dark. You are in the middle of the forest after all.

That's my single complaint of the game. It's dark. It's so dark I gave up twice to catch my breath (and a third time to scream) because it's so dark you may not even figure out what you're doing and you'll go right past something. Matches? Don't even bother with those matches. They won't help you. Some areas the matches seemed to just get sucked into the darkness, like in the mines. After the trolls find you for the first time, matches have a weird way of just not being helpful unless you're right on top of something.

The darkness isn't always a bad thing, but I was constantly missing things because once I backtracked I realized "oh that thing that was covered in darkness that I couldn't see unless it had neon lights on it". Or worse... I'd miss scares. I could hear the scares. I could hear plenty of things. I was missing out on "the spooky" because it was dark. Now in my opinion, if a game has to rely on darkness for a scare to work, that's a terrible gimmick. Thing is, the mood was amazing and everything was great. I just felt disappointed. It was like being the kid who arrived at the parade too late. There was the build up...and I missed it because it was too dark. Times where I'd look and oh I had JUST missed something scary but have some audio.

Yes this really, really bothered me. It took me a while to calm down and decide if I really could like the game or not because some parts of the game were suddenly longer and tedious because I couldn't see and even with swinging the matches around, it was incredibly futile to progress. Once you get over that hump of frustration things become fun again.

Some might find the little issue of how the ending occurs a bit cliched... What are you expecting? Really? From folklore? Really? Do I wanna open up every story ever told and remind you loudly that very rarely has a god, demigod, creature, etc ever blessed anybody without torturing them in return? If you want your dog to come back to life, don't ask someone like that. If you wanted money, bad idea as well. It might be cliched, but it fits with the pattern of how these things work. So what were you expecting, really? Lollipops? A hug? Not happening.

That problem out of the way I did actually enjoy myself. There are times when you can brute force past things if you're willing to hide after and not use matches. You can also take longer routes and confuse enemies. I can have a choice? Great. There's also the harp function of this game which is pretty cool. Better than guitar hero, I swear. Trust me. I'm a human. It's a neat function that feels a teensy bit unwieldy at first but it starts to feel very interesting, even with a mouse. Very cool there.

Healthwise, I can't find anything offensive here. Safe to play. No seizure disco. Nothing hidden. Yes you have some jump scares, but it's a horror game. And to be perfectly honest, they really weren't that bad and it wasn't like they hugged your screen. You'll probably be fine. If you have doubts, you probably shouldn't be playing horror games anyway. It's about four hours playtime. It'll probably be less if you're smarter than me and I'm pretty sure you are. Go get a drink of water... But a kind warning... That's not gonna pause the game...

Have some patience and you might enjoy this. Maybe. At the end I got a little frustrated because it was dark and I was just really fed up with the trolls so I started with a delightfully swear-y song about how I couldn't see my hand in front of me even though I had an entire box of matches. I like to call this the "I Hate Trolls - The Northern Hymn Edition". I invite you to sing your own version and use whatever monster in the game starts to bite on your sensitive parts. Whatever gets you through it.

37989607.review:
[h1]Some general information about the game and my playthrough[/h1]

[*] It is not a walking simulator like some suggest it is. Yes, you have to walk quite a lot, especially at the first half hour or so of the game. However, you will encounter enemies, and you will have puzzles to solve. Walking is not the only thing you do.

[*] I have little over 4 hours of total playtime. However, I went on a lunchbreak with the game running. It took me around 3-3.5 hours to finish this game. For 10 euros that's acceptable for me, but keep in mind, you're not getting a huge amount of gameplay for your money.

[h1]Positives:[/h1]

[*] Pretty good level design for the most part
[*] Not your average super cliché horror game

[h1]Negatives:[/h1]

[*] Minor flaws in the level design here and there
[*] Generic characters
[*] Nothing noteworthy about the music
[*] Very short
[*] Decisions have no impact at all
[*] A lot of missed opportunities with the story
[*] Very short


[h1]Level design:  8/10[/h1]

A mountain was litteraly just planes. No editing done at all, not even some rocks added. I felt like some of the levels could use a bit more "uniqueness" to. Overall though, the level design is very well done.

[h1]Gameplay:  9/10 [/h1]

While I do like the idea of using matches, it was annoying as all hell to have to use a new one every 20 seconds or so. I understand matches don't last long, but it's one of those things I hate about most horror games. Outlast is another perfect example. Having to change battery every minute is not fun. Having to light a new match every 20 seconds is also not fun. Amnesia does this very well. If full of oil, your lantern can last relatively long, and even so you still have to use is warily because it's easy to run out of it. 

This game does have some genuinely scary moments however, and some creative enemie encounters.

[h1]Story:  7/10[/h1]

Not a cliché horror story. However, everything about enemies and other things, are explained in one short note, and then never mentioned again. Pretty much always right after meeting said enemies to. The plot is not terrible, but it felt underdeveloped for me. Every enemie is given a short introduction in a note and that's it.

Same goes for the main characters. They mention this addiction like once during the introduction, only to never mention it again. It was never explained what kind of addiction our main protaganist is suffering from. Story was good, and the characters were alright to I guess, but like I said, underdeveloped. This is despite knowing Swedish and thus being able to read more than I guess most players will be able to do, since many newspapers for example were not translated except for the headline.

One thing that could have been added to, if the story was better developed, are choices that actually matters. I was given  like, 3 choices or so. Either the protaganist would choose for me if I didin't pick on time, the consequence was the same regardless of my decision, or it was an illusion of choice and I really only had one option after all. I would like to see choices that matters, but maybe also get a choice at the end of the game as well.

[h1]Music & Sounds:  7/10[/h1]

Good sound design. Scared me good sometimes. Music however is generic and nothing memorable. Music is one of those things I always pay close attention to in games. I love to listen to game sountracks. I can not really remember any specific soundtrack from this game though. Not bad, just nothing unique.

[h1]Creativity:  9/10[/h1]

Creativity is the section where I bring up things that makes a game unique. Overall, how creative is this game? Besides from a story that felt a bit underdeveloped and generic characters, the game does absolutely show creativity. From the harp, the matches (which unfortunately were annoying, in my opinion) to enemies that aren't generic patrolling zombies.

[h1]Bugs & Flaws:  8/10 [/h1]

I ran out of matches, once. In any other horror game, even if you run out of energy for what ever light source you use, you can still see at least a little bit in the dark. Here, if you run out of the matches, too fucking bad. A lot of areas are pitch black, even if you get the gamma up to max, you will have a bad time. How about adding a boxlight (or what ever you call ambience light in unity) around each map and set them to like the lowest possible setting. Still very dark, but just so we can see a tiny, tiny bit even when we don't have matches.

Also, why the hell does the main protaganist nearly die by falling from a one meter height? This is also every horror game ever for some reason. I litteraly jumped up on a house roof, and ran down. Not jump, just ran. Around a meter in height - nearly died. Seriously?

[h1]Etc:[/h1]

I don't take or add points here, just my opinions. The voice acting would be better in English. The generic Swedish voice acting was not... spooky, I guess, for me.


[h1]Conclusion:[/h1]

Not the best horror game out there, but it's a good game. With more work, it could be a runner-up for that title. It's a solid 8/10 in my opinion. If the short lenght bothers you, pick it up on a sale. Otherwise, buy it whenever.

37985991.review: Офигенная игрушка,если вы прошли аутласты и вам хочется ещё кирпичей,покупать однозначно!

37982186.review:
Okay, so it'd be easy enough to describe this as a "budget" version of Outlast 2 meets Through the Woods. It would be also be appallingly LAZY to do so. This game is deserving of a much more thorough appraisal than that. So let's get down to it, shall we?

   It's usually a good sign when I'm saying to myself, "Hey, this looks pretty good, actually" by the five-minute mark. Better still when I'm saying, "Hey, this looks like it's gonna be REALLY good, actually" by the ten-minute mark. Luckily, this game didn't disappoint me, and only got better from there on in.

   This isn't to say there aren't flaws. The graphics are...more than servicable, but certainly no great shakes in this day and age. The character models, in particular, could at times use a bit more...erm..."finesse", but they're close enough to decent. 

   The mapping is also completely serviceable if a tad uninspired at times, and I found some of the more "open" areas to be a little confusing, given how similar the scenery can often get. (Though it is, in all fairness, a fucking FOREST: if you've ever been in one in real life, they can be a bit like that. Outlast 2 arguably went too far in the OTHER direction, making some of its "outdoor" environments a tad claustrophobic, so we'll split the difference and call that one a draw.)

   The pacing is fantastic. The game is slow to build, yet creepy from the get-go. Thanks to the exceptional sound design, you never feel a moment of ease from the second you set foot in the woods (even if moments of actual danger are few and far between, at least until the end). 

   The lighting mechanic is also excellently handled, with the flashlight held by your initial companion (the protagonist's brother) mixing it up a bit from the horror game cliche of YOU holding and controlling the flashlight. And the matches you use further on are sheer perfection, in the limited quantity that they're given, the length of time that they last (about a minute), and the extra atmospheric details lavished upon them  (they don't always successfully light with the first strike; you cover the wavering flame with your hand when you run; and the match quite visibly and gradually burns down in front of your eyes, before singeing your fingers and forcing you to drop it)! 

   There's also an awesome harp-related series of puzzles, but I won't spoil any of that for you other than to say...they're pretty awesome, and involve the use of a harp.

   The length is also very decent in my opinion - I don't need my stealth-horror games to drag for longer than four to six hours on my first playthrough - and the difficulty level is sufficiently challenging, but never overwhelming (though there was one puzzle which compelled me to reference a walkthrough; but if I'm honest with myself, it was probably more due to my own laziness than any fault on the game's behalf). 

   And, most importantly of all, it's SCARY, which a horror game should generally aspire to being.

   When all is said and done, this game is what innumerable uber-indie horror devs try to pull off, but largely fail in doing so. Is it as good, overall, as Outlast 2? No, of course it isn't. But it's also only half the price. Most gamers need to grow the fuck up and realise that almost no one starts at the top; good things take time. To say that Angry Demon Studios show potential is a criminal understatement: they really have achieved something quite special here, and I wouldn't be surprised if they go on to rival the likes of Red Barrels and Frictional in years to come.

   If you expect more than this from fledgling developers, stick to your AAAs...that really is all I can say. That, and you're an unforgiving, spoiled brat whose Mummy must've wiped your butt 'til you were well into your twenties. The real world is about taking risks, making mistakes, and getting there eventually if you have the vision, talent and stamina (and a bit of luck, maybe). I, for one, hope that Angry Demon (or at least members thereof) are in it for the long haul.

   Verdict: 9/10.

(PS If you enjoyed this review, feel free to check out my two Curator pages: http://store.steampowered.com/curator/9284586-ReviewsJustfortheHELLofit/ 
http://store.steampowered.com/curator/10868048-Truly-Horrible-Horror-Games/?appid=398210
Cheers!)

37980627.review:
画面优质，配乐精良，全程都是满满的紧张感，可收集的北欧神话故事和路边的树人耳语、儿童画等等渲染出的游戏整体氛围非常之赞。游戏玩法类似逃生，收集和生存逃脱要素较多。缺点是剧情有些仓促了，这一点确实挺像神话故事的。。。流程很短，只需要3、4个小时就可以通关，有点意犹未尽的感觉。这个价格称得上是一部佳作，值得一玩。

另外，因为跑动时会晃头部分玩家可能会有点晕3D。

37980314.review:
[h1] Тебе нужно отыскать... что-то золотое... что-то,что позволяет создавать такие мелодии... ты просто не поверишь, что это вообще возможно...[/h1]
Это ИНДИ игра, НО в ней:
-Приятная графика
-60 ФПС
-Крутые звуки. Шелест травы, течение ручья, скрипы деревьев, деревянных полов.
-Атмосфера. Таинственный лес с таинственными существами, по которым НАКОНЕЦ-ТАКИ есть описание, кто это (исходя из легенд). А то насуют монстров в игры, а кто такие, сами думайте, нам насрать, наше дело нарисовать и впихнуть в игру.
-Скримеры. Вот вроде ты ожидаешь, а его нет. А ПОТОМ ХЕРАКС И ИНФАРКТ.
-Жестокость. Выкалывание глаза, отрубание языка. Мать с ребёнком на руках, которая умоляет не трогать их, в то время, как ты открываешь канистру с бензином, поливаешь их и поджигаешь. 
-Проходится за 1 вечерок.
-Нет вылетов, проваливания в текстуры, просадок ФПС, багов.
[h1] Они появились ночью... прямо из тьмы и пустоты...[/h1]
-Это самый лучший хоррор, вышедший в этом году. 
-Игра жуткая. Начало непонятное. Но вообще, мы ходим по тёмному лесу, выполняем поставленные нам задачи, ничего сложного. Находим рисунки детей, на которых нарисованы эти существа. Книжки, в которых эти существа описаны.
-Фонарика нет, есть спички. Интерфейса в игре нет. Паузы в игре нет. Меню паузы открывается, но игра на паузу не ставится. Кол-во спичек проверяется путём вытаскивания коробка, и считанием их вручную. Карты-стоят на каждой ключевой точке с крестиком, где мы, и куда нас выведут какие тропинки.
-ДОМА. В них лежат спички, рисунки, книги, но не ключевые предметы для прохождения. НО КАК В НИХ СТРЁМНО НАХОДИТСЯ. У каждого дома своя история. И в каждом доме свои звуки. Они настолько жуткие, странные, непонятные, что просто хочется поскорее покинуть дом, ибо страшно.
-На протяжении игры с нами общаются деревья... Люди, замурованные в деревья... И было интересно узнать, какого хрена тут произошло. И нам ОБ ЭТОМ РАССКАЗЫВАЮТ. Нам рассказывают обо всём, что тут происходит. ЭТО ТАК РЕДКО ВСТРЕЧАЕТСЯ.
-Существа. Они издают такие жуткие звуки. Тролль, который ходит где-то вдалеке и валит деревья. Плач детей, превратившихся в чёртиков, слепых, но не глухих. Баба, которая орёт где-то вдалеке. А пока ты лутаешь дом, слышишь, как её пение всё ближе, ты бежишь закрывать дверь, пение замолкает, и по ветхим стенам деревянного дома начинается постукивание. И ТЫ ПРОСТО НАХЕР ВЫЛЕТАЕШЬ НА ШИФТЕ ИЗ ДОМА И БЕЖИШЬ В СОСЕДНЕЕ СЕЛО.
-Я в этой игре ходил, кружась вокруг себя. Мне было очково, что на меня кто-то нападёт, из тумана. Я от резких поворотов и атмосферы дёргался от камней и деревьев, думал, что кто-то стоит.
Бывало, нагнетающая музыка идёт совместно с криками/плачем множества существ, и просто "ГДЕ, ОТКУДА ПРИДУТ?", и вот, музыка тебя окружает, и бах, резко пропадает, и ты откидываешься на спинку кресла, покачиваясь, и идёшь заваривать чаёк.
[h1] Те, кто обитает между миров-они наполовину живы и наполовину мертвы, они слоняются по этому миру забвения,выбирая самые недоступные места. Они ищут то место, где невидимая грань между двумя мирами практически незаметна.[/h1]
-Начало довольно скудное. Идём минут 10 с братом по лесу. Просто идём и говорим. 
-Брат обращается (мы играем за бабу) к своей сестре в мужском роде. Не понимаю проблему игр данную.
-НЕЛЬЗЯ поменять управление. Ну какого хрена, 2017 год. Спички достаются на ЛКМ. Я сперва зря тратил просто так их по привычке нажимал. В итоге полез в программу, перенастроил, что бы спички доставались на F, а на ЛКМ было действие.
-Чувствительность. В этой игре опять для меня маленькая чувств. мышки. Выкрутил на максимум тут, и пришлось в проге увеличивать DPI до 5к.
[h1] Она приближается, она идёт сюда! Нам не скрыться... Вы не сможете убежать... никто не сможет убежать... Деревья...
Она ждёт нас где-то среди деревьев.[/h1]

37968197.review:
游戏做的非常的赞， 让玩家体验了一把瑞典经典的民间恐怖故事。
游戏的氛围做的也相当好，音效上很有意思，有许多地方纯靠音效制造恐怖气氛。让人耳目一新。
我前后打了3周目，在第三周目就做到了无死亡。其实整个流程还是挺简单地。
绝大多数玩家可能会卡关在以下几个地方
1.过桥      其实只要回到监护人那个房子里找钥匙就行了（房子位置就在给树人点蜡烛旁边的房子里）
2.找到竖琴之后去哪里       回到钟楼，把竖琴放上去仔细听提示。
3.进到矿洞里之后怎么办     先开发电机 然后找电线
无伤通关视频  https://www.bilibili.com/video/av16818399/

37968071.review:
Pros:
Tree tipping

Cons:
Un-fluid like character movement.
Generic walking simulator.
Annoying voice-overs.
No spooky atmosphere.

I pulled the trigger on this game and instantly regretted it. Even the low price does not qualify this as scary. I was not drawn into the atmosphere and the brother looked like he was made on a Friday night after the developer had no time to spare before pushing this to full release. Granted this game might be for some people but many it will not. I decided to return after the first encounter with a mythical monster/ghost or whatever it was. Repeating environments. Etc. To each their own but if you are looking for something immersive look elsewhere.

37951939.review:
Good price, great atmosphere with graphics to match.
I played the demo to this game a while ago and it was so good!
When I saw the game was available on steam I got it straight away and I wasn’t disappointed. I’ve completed the game and it’s honestly one of the best indie horrors I’ve ever played! Definitely some good jumpscares in there and some terrifying monster! Not to mention the storyline is great.

If i could give some advice without giving away too much, don’t waste your matches I ran out at one point and freaked out a little :D also stay sneaky (:

37935816.review:
[h1]У меня были серьезные сомнения на счет этой игры[/h1]

Судите сами: Инди-разработчик, приличная скидка на старте, слабенькая модель лысого «попутчика», да и первый монстр скорее разочаровал, нежели напугал. Очень простой, чисто условный дизайн, скудное наполнение лесных локаций. Иногда натыкаешься на откровенную халтуру – ровные стены гор. Да и авторы не особо умеют пугать игрока, отчего совсем не страшно. Не удивительно, что первые 80 минут, рука тянулась к кнопке возврата покупки.
Но потом начала работать какая-то магия и игрушка расцвела, стали заметны скрытые грани. Стала доступна большая открытая локация, появилась новая механика игры на арфе… и игра понравилась, сразу захотелось написать положительный обзор.

[b]Первые 2 часа игры – это симулятор ходьбы. Потом появляется легкий саспенс.[/b]

[h1]На что похожа[/h1]
Больше всего игра похожа на [b]Through the Woods[/b]. Есть сходства и с Outlast 2, Lumber Island - That Special Place, The Cursed Forest, Left alone, Kholat, Penumbra.

[h1]Понравилось: [/h1]
+ Интересная незнакомая мифология, которую интересно изучать.
+ Приятное освещение и эффекты тумана.
+ Интригующий сюжет, раскрывающийся в записках.
+ Местами есть эмоциональные моменты. Например, связанные с лысым «попутчиком» (вы поймете о чем я).
+ Игра не пугает тебя на каждом шагу, а дает поисследовать локации, собирать спички.
+ Качественная озвучка
+ Есть русский язык из коробки
+ Приятная цена.

[h1]Не понравилось: [/h1]
- Слабенькая модель и анимация лысого «попутчика»
- Модели монстров скорее разочаровывают, нежели пугают. 
- Условный дизайн лесных локаций, скудное наполнение. Ровные стены гор местами.
- Авторы не особо умеют пугать игрока, отчего сначала совсем не страшно.
- Нельзя поменять раскладку

[b]Моя оценка: 7 странных скандинавских монстров из 10[/b]

37918458.review:
First I am early in this game and will continue the series on my twitch.tv/scampdizzle channel this week of 11/28/17-11/? pending the length.
So far this game is really fun! I think it has great atmosphere, horror, immersion, and overall insidious creepy scares, while still having a good plot, controls and effects.  You play as a young female who is lost in the woods after her bf(Lukas) kidnaps and ties her up. You awake in the backseat of the car  scared and confused. He does this, as you find out later, as an attempt to "fix" your addiction habit but you force him to crash by kicking his head.  Once crashed you follow him in the dark woods with eerie horrific noises, unexplained shadows, bloody carcasses which are followed up with a constant feeling of "you're being watched". Its hard to capture that "gotta look behind me"feeling without forcing you to do so in a game so bravo.  This game is in Swedish but it doenst really matter as its very immersive regardless. I give this game a high score so far as i am only into the begining chapters, but if you're looking for a really good horror game with both valed jumpscares, and true atmospheric horror, its def worth the $10. TBH i found it a lot better then most games i paided 2x for.

37912731.review:
The real horror starts when you're not sure if you're actually being hunted or not, all the while the music and background noises keep playing with you.

10/10

37910821.review:
Pretty cool game, i liked the atmosphere and the swedish voice acting kinda fits. The scandinavian folk lore was pretty damn good; gods, demons and creatures alike. The ending left some to be desired but there might be more endings i do not know about.

Chat gave this game, 81/100 very much bang for the buck, Good Job would recommend this game. 

It reminded me of my own childhood when i saw big naked men in the forest. I can't believe what happened to Bobby, the most brutal twist of any game i ever played. Lukas was pretty cool guy.

Tack så mycket.

37886029.review:
Seems to be a terrific experience, I have played for about a half an hour so far, and if the rest of the game has as much potential, it'll be far beyond anything I could of hoped for.  The atmosphere is relentless, a constant driving force that keeps you on edge at all times.  The graphics and production value are terrific.  Everything feels brutal and unironically, unforgiving.  The Swedish voice acting actually seems to add more to the realism, and it's very well done.  You understand the reasoning behind the characters, you feel their emotions, you care about them.  That's all I'm going to say for now, this game is a STEAL at this price.  So check out some gameplay below if you're still hesitant to buy it

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H-uJtlqd298&t=12s

37849762.review:
Доброго времени суток!
поиграл 2 часа в Unforgiving - A Northern Hymn! Что можно сказать?
+ Атмосферно и самобытно.
+ Хороший звук, амбиентовая музыка, всякие шорохи сделаны очень хорошо (играть лучше в наушниках)
+ Графен он как бы есть, но его как бы нет, но всё же в сторону плюса.
+ Сюжет непонятный и за 2 часа особо не дают разобраться что  к чему, но в этом то и интерес - интригует
+ Жирный плюс за цену игры. серьёзно. когда добавил игру в список желаемого о цене не было информации и я думал что она будет стоить ну не меньше 1к рублей, но в день релиза был приятно удивлён! 360р (по скидке 241р) этож почти даром!
- Минусы имеются в виде небольших багов со звуком, мелкие фризы при подгрузке карты, и еще пару незначительных..
Итог игра СТОИТ ВНИМАНИЯ! За такие деньги игре можно простить мелкие баги, которые скорее всего пофиксят патчиком. Очень атмосферно, пугающе и интересно! По мере прохождения дополню обзор, а пока можете ознакомится с началом игры и в последствии полным прохождением! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZUJzQjJn5Uw&t=2s
